name: RelativeDateTimeFormatter.DateTimeStyle
desc: A type that represents the style to use when formatting relative dates, such as “1 week ago” or “last week”.

items.name: case named
items.desc: A style that uses named styles to describe relative dates, such as “yesterday”, “last week”, or “next week”.

items.name: case numeric
items.desc: A style that uses a numeric style to describe relative dates, such as “1 day ago” or “in 3 weeks”.
